Package io.github.pirateducks.screen

Interface Screen

All Known Implementing Classes:
College, CollegeDefeatedScreen, ConstantineMemoryGame, GameCompleteScreen, GameOverScreen, Goodricke, Langwith, LevelManager, MainLevel, MainMenuScreen, PauseScreen, VictoryScreen
public interface Screen
This interface is used to create a new screen in the game Contains all the methods needed for a screen

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
    Called to draw the screen
    void resume()
    Resumes displaying, this is called after the pause menus stops displaying
    void startDisplaying​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
    Called when this screen becomes the active screen
    void stopDisplaying()
    Called when this screen is no longer the active screen Use this method to dispose of everything
    void update​(float delta)
    Called to update the screen

  • Method Details

    • draw

      Called to draw the screen
      Parameters:
      batch -

    • update

      void update​(float delta)
      Called to update the screen
      Parameters:
      delta - The delta time since the last update

    • startDisplaying

      void startDisplaying​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
      Called when this screen becomes the active screen

    • stopDisplaying

      void stopDisplaying()
      Called when this screen is no longer the active screen Use this method to dispose of everything

    • resume

      void resume()
      Resumes displaying, this is called after the pause menus stops displaying
